Beef Stroganoff 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Chicken Parmesan 
Ingredients: Instructions: grated Parmesan cheese. •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
•  Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. 
•  Dredge chicken in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with a mixture of breadcrumbs and •  Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. 
•  Cook chicken until golden brown on both sides. • 
•  Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until translucent. 
•  Add sliced beef and cook until browned. 
•  Stir in mushrooms and cook until tender. 
•  Sprinkle flour over the mixture and stir to combine. 
•  Gradually add beef broth, stirring constantly until the sauce thickens. 
•  Stir in sour cream and paprika, season with salt and pepper. 
•  Simmer for a few minutes until heated through. 
•  Serve over egg noodles or rice. •  4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts 
•  1 cup breadcrumbs 
•  1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
•  1 cup marinara sauce 
•  1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded 
•  2 eggs, beaten 
•  1/2 cup flour 
•  1/4 cup olive oil 
•  Salt and pepper to taste •  1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 cup mushrooms, sliced 
•  1 cup beef broth 
•  1 cup sour cream 
•  2 tablespoons flour 
•  2 tablespoons butter 
•  1 teaspoon paprika 
•  Salt and pepper to taste 
•  Egg noodles or rice for serving Spaghetti Bolognese

Ingredients: •  Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine (if using), oregano, basil, salt, and •  Place chicken in a baking dish, top with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese. 
•  Bake for 20-25 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. 
•  Serve warm. •  Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. 
•  Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 
•  Serve Bolognese sauce over spaghetti, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese.

Ingredients: Instructions: half. Beef Tacos 
Ingredients: •  Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat. 
•  Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. 
•  Add shrimp and cook until pink and opaque. 
•  Remove shrimp from the skillet and set aside. 
•  Pour white wine, chicken broth, and lemon juice into the skillet, simmer until reduced by • 
•  Marinate chicken thighs in the mixture for at least 30 minutes. 
•  Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat. 
•  Cook chicken thighs until browned and cooked through. 
•  Pour marinade into the skillet and simmer until thickened. 
•  Serve chicken over cooked rice, garnished with sliced green onions. •  Return shrimp to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce. 
•  Season with salt and pepper, stir in chopped parsley. 
•  Serve over cooked pasta. •  Sliced green onions for garnish •  1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined 
•  4 cloves garlic, minced

Ingredients: Instructions: In a skillet, cook ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned. In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, grated Parmesan cheese, basil, and oregano. Layer with 3 lasagna noodles, 1/3 of the ricotta mixture, 1/3 of the meat sauce, and 1/3 
of the shredded mozzarella cheese. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. Chicken Alfredo 
Ingredients: •  Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings • 
•  Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened. 
•  Stir in taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened. 
•  Serve beef mixture in taco shells or tortillas with desired toppings. •  Repeat layers twice more. 
•  Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. 
•  Remove foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. 
• •  1 pound ground beef 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 jar (24 ounces) marinara sauce 
•  1 can (15 ounces) ricotta cheese 
•  1 egg 
•  1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
•  1 teaspoon dried basil 
•  1 teaspoon dried oregano 
•  9 lasagna noodles, cooked 
•  2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese •  4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts 
•  1 pound fettuccine 
•  1 cup heavy cream 
•  1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
•  1/4 cup butter •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
• 
•  Stir in marinara sauce and simmer for 10 minutes. 
• 
•  Spread a thin layer of meat sauce in a baking dish.

Ingredients: Instructions: In a skillet, cook ground lamb or beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned. Pad Thai 
Ingredients:

•  Cook fettuccine according to package instructions. 
In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat. 
• 
•  Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. 
•  Add chicken breasts and cook until golden and cooked through. 
•  Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside. 
•  Pour heavy cream into the skillet and bring to a simmer. 
•  Stir in grated Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth. 
•  Season with salt and pepper. 
•  Slice chicken and return to the skillet. 
•  Toss cooked fettuccine with the sauce and chicken. 
•  Garnish with chopped parsley and serve. •  Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). 
• 
•  Stir in peas and carrots, beef broth, tomato paste, and Worcestershire sauce. 
•  Simmer until thickened, season with salt and pepper. 
•  Transfer meat mixture to a baking dish. 
•  Spread mashed potatoes over the top and sprinkle with grated cheddar cheese. 
•  Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and bubbly. 
•  Serve warm. •  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  Salt and pepper to taste 
•  Chopped parsley for garnish •  1 pound ground lamb or beef 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 cup frozen peas and carrots 
•  1 cup beef broth 
•  2 tablespoons tomato paste 
•  2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce 
•  4 cups mashed potatoes 
•  1/4 cup grated cheddar cheese 
•  Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: Beef Bourguignon 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. •  Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain. 
•  Sauté shrimp or chicken in vegetable oil until cooked, then set aside. 
•  Scramble eggs in the same pan. 
•  Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, sugar, and lime juice, stir to combine. 
•  Add bean sprouts, cooked shrimp or chicken, and chopped green onions. 
•  Garnish with chopped peanuts and serve.

•  Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). 
• 
•  Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until translucent. 
•  Add beef cubes and cook until browned on all sides. 
•  Sprinkle flour over the beef and stir to combine. 
•  Add red wine, beef broth, tomato paste, thyme, and bay leaf. •  8 ounces rice noodles 
•  1/2 pound shrimp or chicken 
•  2 eggs 
•  1 cup bean sprouts 
•  1/4 cup peanuts, chopped 
•  2 tablespoons fish sauce 
•  2 tablespoons tamarind paste 
•  1 tablespoon sugar 
•  1 tablespoon lime juice 
•  1/4 cup green onions, chopped 
•  2 tablespoons vegetable oil •  2 pounds beef chuck, cut into cubes 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 cup red wine 
•  2 cups beef broth 
•  1 cup mushrooms, sliced 
•  1 cup carrots, sliced 
•  1 cup pearl onions 
•  2 tablespoons tomato paste 
•  2 tablespoons flour 
•  2 tablespoons butter 
•  1 teaspoon thyme 
•  1 bay leaf 
•  Salt and pepper to taste Chicken Cacciatore 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. In the same skillet, sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell pepper until 
softened. Chicken Marsala 
Ingredients: •  Stir in diced tomatoes, chicken broth, red wine, oregano, basil, and olives. 
•  Return chicken to the skillet and simmer for 30 minutes until chicken is cooked through. 
•  Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
•  Serve warm. •  Bring to a simmer, then cover and transfer to the oven. 
•  Cook for 2 hours, adding mushrooms, carrots, and pearl onions in the last 30 minutes. 
•  Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
•  Serve warm. •  4 boneless, skinless chicken thighs 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 bell pepper, sliced 
•  1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes 
•  1/2 cup chicken broth 
•  1/4 cup red wine

•  1 teaspoon dried basil 
•  1/4 cup olives, sliced 
•  2 tablespoons olive oil 
•  Salt and pepper to taste

•  Add chicken thighs and cook until browned on both sides, then set aside.

Ingredients: Instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, grated ginger, cumin, coriander, 
turmeric, paprika, and garam masala. Eggplant Parmesan 
Ingredients: •  Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then dredge in flour. 
In a large skillet, heat olive oil and butter over medium heat. 
• 
•  Cook chicken until golden and cooked through, then set aside. 
• 
•  Add Marsala wine and chicken broth, simmer until reduced by half. 
•  Return chicken to the skillet and coat with the sauce. 
•  Garnish with chopped parsley and serve. •  Marinate chicken cubes in the mixture for at least 1 hour. 
In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. 
• 
•  Cook diced onion until translucent. 
•  Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. 
•  Stir in diced tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes. 
•  Add heavy cream and simmer for an additional 10 minutes. 
•  Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
•  Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve. •  1 pound chicken breast, cubed 
•  1 cup yogurt 
•  2 tablespoons lemon juice

•  1 teaspoon garam masala

•  Chopped cilantro for garnish • Instructions: and grated Parmesan cheese. In a baking dish, layer eggplant slices, marinara sauce, and shredded mozzarella cheese. Fish Tacos

•  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).

•  Dredge eggplant in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with a mixture of breadcrumbs •

•  Cook eggplant until golden brown on both sides. 
• 
•  Repeat layers and top with remaining cheese. 
•  Bake for 25-30 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. 
•  Serve warm. •  1 pound white fish fillets (such as cod or tilapia)

Let rest before slicing and serving.

Ingredients: Instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. In the same skillet, melt butter and sauté sliced onion and apples until softened. Ratatouille 
Ingredients: •  Add shrimp, mussels, and cooked chicken, simmer for an additional 10 minutes until seafood is cooked and rice is tender. 
•  Garnish with lemon wedges and serve. •  Season pork chops with salt and pepper. 
• 
•  Cook pork chops until browned on both sides, then set aside. 
• 
•  Stir in apple cider, chicken broth, and thyme. 
•  Return pork chops to the skillet and simmer for 10 minutes until cooked through. 
•  Serve warm.

•  4 pork chops 
•  2 apples, sliced
